body.name: DreamField Linen Bamboo Body Pillow for Adults - Shredded Adjustable Memory Foam Long Cooling Pillows, Removable and Washable Bamboo Hypoallergenic Cover with Zipper
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 5 mins
features: NEVER GOES FLAT - Our bamboo body pillow is made with the highest quality memory foam so it will never go flat. Memory foam is great for those who prefer soft or firm pillows. Our long pillows for sleeping stays firm even after many use

GREAT BENEFITS & SUPPORT - These long body pillows are great for side sleepers and back sleepers and provide comfort during pregnancy. You can use it as a hug pillow. Our body pillows for adults can be used as a pregnancy pillow keeping you comfortable with our cooling technology bamboo cover.

TOP GRADE MATERIAL - Don't settle for less. The body pillow filling is shredded memory foam using top grade material. With the extra fluffy filling and breathable hypoallergenic covers you will enjoy hugging and cuddling with our full body pillow.

ADJUSTABLE FILLING: Our pillows redefine the meaning of personalized comfort. Featuring an innovative adjustable filling, you have the power to tailor your pillow to perfection. No more settling for pillows that are too high, too low, too soft, or too firm. With our unique design, you can effortlessly modify the loft and firmness by adding or removing the premium shredded memory foam filling.

DESIGNED JUST FOR YOU - A restful sleep is our mission - We want to make sure that you get the best night's sleep possible, every single night. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your Body Pillow, please reach out to us directly!
MACHINE WASHABLE - Our body pillow is machine washable. Just unzip the hypoallergenic body pillow cover and toss it in the washer

100% GUARANTEED WARRANTY - We, at DreamField Linen have committed ourselves to provide all our customers with the most top quality products so you can have a comfortable and healthy life. However, if you are not completely satisfied for any reason, simply contact our customer support and we will do everything to make you 100% satisfied with your purchase.

It will align your spine, support your neck, and prevent pain making you feel rejuvenated! Neck Support Sleep like an angel with our pillow for neck pain Legs and Knee Support Best pillow for legs, cushion for those looking for relief as the cushion comfortably supports your legs & knees to provide proper sleeping alignment & positioning to eliminate those painful pressure points Pregnancy Support Provides Comfort and Support during pregnancy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd body pillow I’ve purchased for my wife. The first one was longer but it became compressed and separated and ended up as a dog bed. I got her this bamboo pillow to replace it a few months ago and she loves it, it’s has stayed full and firm and 100% hers and she’s not willing to share and my jealousy raged ! She finally grew tired of my whining and bought me one of my own, it showed up today !This pillow is very supportive yet soft & comfortable. I’m a side sleeper and my head can’t be buried into a pillow, it’s too claustrophobic. Laying my head on this pillow is like laying on a comfortable piece of stone. I know, sounds weird but my face is clear and my head is firmly supported. I haven’t felt the need to wrap my body around this yet but if I do, it’s nice to have that option.Anyway, great GREAT pillow and I’m VERY pleased with the quality of materials and construction.If your in the market for a body pillow, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this body pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I had the same body pillow for over 15 years. I washed it several times, and it kept breaking down with each wash. I finally gave in and ordered this memory foam body pillow here on Amazon, and I absolutely love it. It's a little heavy, which I like, and it gives excellent support for my legs and arms. Very comfortable. I'm glad that I bit the bullet, and made the purchase. The cover that came with it was great, but it was light color and I didn't want it to look disgusting after a while, so I bought a dark cover for it, but it's not as comfortable as the cover that came with the pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Firm but short.
reviews.reviewText: This body pillow is very firm, which is exactly what I was looking for. It did sleep rather hot though, and the pillow is only 48" long - shorter than the standard 54" for a body pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and quality
reviews.reviewText: good asset to aid sleeping after surgery, very good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised for the money how nice this body pillow is. It has a lot of support perfect for my hip surgery recovery. Highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too overfilled and does't perform like memory foam should.
reviews.reviewText: I would return it but feel silly schlepping a big, overstuffed body pillow down to the UPS store. It's too over-stuffed for me, and it feels like I'm sleeping with an obstacle. Part of what I want in a body pillow is something I can put my leg over, without having my foot sticking 12" in the air. Regardless of what they say in their advertising...I GET HOT AND SWEATY sleeping with it. Now with that said, it's not too bad to sleep with once you get over how big it is and that getting hot will wake you up. If you sleep with a partner, better get a King-size bed to accommodate the additional body-like lump you will be sharing your bed with.As far as "memory foam" goes, I think it loses it's memory when shredded. It's a good way to use left over memory foam but something gets lost in the translation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Body Pillow!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the second body pillow I have owned from this manufacturer. The first one I had was great, but it was heavy. Due to medical problems I gave it to my son, and he still uses it! I discovered that the lightweight pillows do not hold their shape and go flat. After several years I decided to get the same body pillow again. I received it yesterday and I was surprised to see the directions saying you had to massage the pillow and put it in the dryer once a week for 1 month! Instead of all that nonsense I opened the pillow package about 7 hours prior to bed so it could puff up! I put a body pillow case on it and it was fantastic!!!! Something new with this pillow is that you can remove some of the shredded memory foam to make it your perfect pillow!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Used to be good, now? Notsomuch
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure what happened to this product. I have 2 of the King Size pillows from this same company, bought within the last year. I mean it’s everything you could actually hope for. Floating clouds. So when I found myself single and decided I wanted something soft between my legs, I of course set my eyes on the floating cloud. I go to my old Cloud purchase, click the same company, grab the King Size… realize it’s more expensive than others, but I think “It’s worth it man, how often do you get to ba.. uh sleep with a floating cloud?” So I bought it.When it arrived I woke up and went outside to go to work. I got it out of the box and unrolled it. It was compressed and figured it needed time to rise, we’ve all been there (especially us older guys). I set it on the bed and went to work. Rough day. Tired. Wanted to shower and relax in bed. I go to the bedroom and I simply can’t express how shocked I am (well not as shocked as when I found my ex but we’ll say it’s a close 2nd). This pillow rose like an inch (like my ex’s new bf). This thing is literally flatter than my ex’s backside, and has much less secondary uses.I wish I could swear in this review. There’s so much rage in me. I’m not sure what happened to the company. My best guess? They’re also going through a rough breakup because it looks like their girl took half of the freaking stuffing when she split.It’s been 6 days. I’m returning this trash.*Will update with photos*

J'ai vu des articles de moindre qualité dans une boutique spécialisée pour deux fois et demie le prix. À la réception, j'avoue avoir été déçu de l'allure de l'oreiller. J'ai suivi les indications du manufacturier, et le résultat est surprenant! Doux, confortable et de bonne dimension. Vaut définitivement le prix!
Only had for couple days. So far so great. easy to unpack, do have to wait 24 hours to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Pillow - Great Quality - but a bit large
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is great in the sense that it is full, however its a bit bulker and therefore heavy while tossing and turning at night. I like to hug my pillow all night and keep my legs wrapped around as I am a side sleeper, but its rather heavy and I need to wake up in order to move it around with me. I am 5'5" and length is perfect. I am also a large lady (200lbs). None the less the quality is excellent and the material is soft and breathable. TO THE MANUFACTURER: if you made the width a few inches thinner - around 4 inch loss in total circumference (and therefore removed some of the stuffing to make it lighter and saved yourself some cost of fabric and stuffing) it would be perfect. I will be adjusting this and sewing it on my own. Great pillow overall just the same.
